column4: linux newb here Been flipping between Ubuntu 9.10 and Mint 8, hoping to find a happy place for my internet/media/video chat laptop.
2 ghz core 2 duo, 3 gigs of ram Toshiba laptop

Been experiencing a strange slowdown when typing in Firefox. System seems to just stop for a moment. Cursor still flashes and I can call up restart window via ctrl, alt, delete and reboot most of the time. I usually have Firefox, Thunderbird & Pidgin running at the same time when this occurs. Slowdown lasts for 30 seconds up to 2 minutes. When it hits the 2 minute mark I reboot/shutdown. Any ideas on why or what is going o
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
